test-case.sql: SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'information_schema' ORDER BY table_name LIMIT 10
SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = 'information_schema' AND table_name = 'tables' LIMIT 5
SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'mysql' ORDER BY table_name LIMIT 10

SELECT 'information_schema' as schema_name, COUNT(*) as table_count FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'information_schema' UNION ALL SELECT 'performance_schema' as schema_name, COUNT(*) as table_count FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'performance_schema' UNION ALL SELECT 'mysql' as schema_name, COUNT(*) as table_count FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'mysql' UNION ALL SELECT 'sys' as schema_name, COUNT(*) as table_count FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'sys' ORDER BY schema_name

SELECT constraint_schema, constraint_name, table_name, constraint_type FROM information_schema.table_constraints WHERE constraint_schema IN ('mysql', 'information_schema') ORDER BY constraint_schema, constraint_name LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM information_schema.engines WHERE engine IN ('InnoDB', 'MyISAM', 'MEMORY', 'CSV') ORDER BY engine
SELECT * FROM performance_schema.setup_instruments WHERE name LIKE 'statement/sql/%' ORDER BY name LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM performance_schema.setup_consumers ORDER BY name LIMIT 5
SELECT Host, User FROM mysql.user WHERE host = 'localhost' LIMIT 5
SELECT Db, User FROM mysql.db ORDER BY db, user LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM sys.schema_table_statistics ORDER BY total_latency DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM sys.processlist ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM sys.sys_config ORDER BY variable LIMIT 5
